agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Environmental Regulation TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, April 24, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. J. M. Lozano The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 1391 Bohac Relating to inspections of solid waste facilities conducted by the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality. HB 4360 Thompson, Ed Relating to the review of permit applications for municipal solid waste facilities and the issuance of a notice of deficiency. HB 3783 Burrows Relating to the transportation of municipal solid waste in certain enclosed vehicles. SB 530 Birdwell Relating to civil and administrative penalties assessed or imposed for violations of laws protecting drinking water, public water supplies, and bodies of water. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
